about_the_game:
The Away Team Soundtrack. 16 tracks all in FLAC format.

Includes the following tracks:
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 01 - Main Menu.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 02 - Astrum Cloud.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 03 - Exodus139.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 04 - Somewhere Far.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 05 - Zenith.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 06 - Its Out There.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 07 - Gas Giant.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 08- Waves of Space.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 09 - Intro Spector.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 10 - Light Brigade.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 11 - Omni Terra.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 12 - Slumber Void.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 13 - Yellow Dwarf.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 14 - Starscape.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 15 - Protosythesis.flac
Underflow Studios - The Away Team - 16 - Orbital.flac
